about_the_game:
Consciousness... Where? Unknown. Who are all these dudes in robes? Only one way forward: through the door.


Overview:
This is a game about finding your path, surviving the mysterious afterlife, and solving the riddle of your purpose in this curious world.

This game will continue to grow with more features and content. Keep an eye out for updates on the official website!



Features:
  • Randomly generated roguelike runs
  • Universal controller support (or mouse and keyboard)
  • Metagame unlockables
  • Charming creatures, and one total asshole
  • Acquire powerful weapons
  • 3 obnoxiously colorful environments
  • Memorable encounters and challenges
  • Cheese-friendly combat

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 13 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

name: You Are Dead

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7600 GS (512 MB) or equivalent
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

short_description: Find magic weapons and abracadabra your way through colorful domains and their challenging bosses in this roguelite twin-stick shooter.
